meanings.definition: Relating to the study of the structure and function of tissues in living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The histophysiological research focused on understanding how tissues work in animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use histophysiological techniques to explore the inner workings of living tissues.
meanings.sent3: The histophysiological investigation into plant cells revealed some surprising facts.
meanings.sent4: Her histophysiological approach to analyzing tissue function was like peeling back layers of a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Through histophysiological studies, we can uncover the secrets of tissue functions in organisms.

meanings.definition: Involving the examination of the physiological processes within tissues.
meanings.sent1: The histophysiological changes in the cells were carefully observed under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Doctors rely on histophysiological tests to understand how tissues are functioning.
meanings.sent3: The histophysiological study of muscle fibers provided valuable insights for medical research.
meanings.sent4: His histophysiological analysis of tissue functions was like deciphering a complex code.
meanings.sent5: The histophysiological approach allows us to delve deep into the inner workings of tissues.
